Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel located in the centre of Rome”
Reviews.Author: Trevordg
Reviews.Content: booked hotel usually stay sistina packed hotel located 5 minutes walk sistina minutes termini train station front desk staff extremely polite helpful albeit largest comfortable clean definite plus free wifi hotel excellent connection downstairs lounge comfortable whilst terrace fourth floor provides views downside hotel breakfast time werent tables accomodate guests
